title: Coyote Non Grata
description: The Creator laughs at human plans… Dr. Jeff Gleason rejected his Comanche heritage and became a volcanologist studying the giant magma chamber beneath a national park. Until his modern job and his Medicine heritage cross paths. Rody, wounded and rejected from his coyote shifter pack, seeks refuge and medical help from the human in the ranger shack, then joins his new friend on a sexual romp that will lead to a new mating of coyote and man that hasn’t happened since the white man came to the park.…because the Creator has plans of his own.
author: Lena Austin
